attributes.additional_details:
Rougly 33,000 people die because of Alcohol misuse in the UK every year. Why? Because they don't drink responsibly. Sure, have a glass of wine! Make it two! Anymore then three? No thank you. Help us abolish the misuse of Alcohol. Help us put a limit on the amount people drink in a pub, or how much they buy. Lets place a 3 unit limit in how much alcohol is served in a pub or bought in a shop. Please, stop and think... It could be you next.

Help Britain drink safely.
